job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkel en onderhoud je slimme IT-oplossingen die enorme hoeveelheden data verwerken
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development and maintenance of IT solutions for processing large amounts of data, which is the core of data engineering.
Optimizing data processes is a key responsibility within data engineering, focusing on efficiency and performance.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen en implementeren van nieuwe technologieën
job_tasks.justification: While broad, the act of implementing new technologies often involves software development to integrate them into existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: vertalen naar internationale wet- en regelgeving
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand business context and translate it into technical solutions.
Advising clients on data quality requires understanding business needs and how data impacts them.
Developing reports and dashboards typically involves software development and data visualization techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Klanten adviseren over datakwaliteit, datamapping en modellering
job_tasks.justification: Advising on 'modellering' (modeling) directly falls under the modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: adviseren over innovatieve technologieën zoals generative AI
job_tasks.justification: Advising on generative AI implies an understanding and potential application of modeling techniques related to AI.

soft_skills.phrase: werk je nauw samen met onze compliance analisten
krijgt volop ruimte om nieuwe technologieën te ontdekken en te implementeren

classification.rationale: The role primarily focuses on developing and maintaining data processing solutions, optimizing data processes, and advising on data quality and modeling. While generative AI is mentioned, it's in an advisory capacity rather than core development. The emphasis is more on data engineering and traditional modeling advice than building generative AI applications.
